sentences.english: Might UAVs eventually replace manned combat aircraft altogether?
sentences.chinese: 那麼無人機是否可能完全替代人工駕駛的戰鬥機？

sentences.english: Moviemakers are using drones to film from the sky.
sentences.chinese: 電影製片人使用無人機在天空裏拍電影。
奧漢隆說，這些官員懷念他們的無人機。

sentences.english: Other system components include a post-mission analysis station and the ground control station for the VTUAV.
sentences.chinese: 無人機其他系統組件包括任務後分析站和地面控制站。

sentences.english: A small communication jammer, usually employed as a piece of equipment on some RPV(remotely piloted vehicle), is increasingly important.
sentences.chinese: 設計了小型無人機機載通信干擾機的控制系統。

sentences.english: At the same time, the drones are clearly inflicting significant damage on the jihadists.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，無人機明顯對聖戰分子造成了巨大的損傷。

sentences.english: The characteristics of microburst and its modeling requirements in real time flight simulation were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 文中闡述了一種無人機飛行仿真系統的設計方法。

sentences.english: The control software has been produced by Thales UK at its Crawley facility.
sentences.chinese: “守望者”無人機控制軟件由泰利斯英國公司開發。

sentences.english: A police constable in Liverpool tries out the force's new remote-controlled UAV.
sentences.chinese: 一名利物浦的警員在試用部隊的新遙控無人機。

sentences.english: What China owes the United States is more than just a $150000 drone.
sentences.chinese: 中國欠美國的遠不止一個15萬美元的無人機。

sentences.english: Additional payloads will be integrated into the air vehicle and control segment in the future.
sentences.chinese: 未來，還會有其他載荷被集成到無人機和控制部分中。

sentences.english: Multi-UAV simulation system, AIAA on the article.
sentences.chinese: 多無人機仿真系統，AIAA上的一篇文章。

sentences.english: The egg-shaped aircraft can reach a top speed of 160 kilometers per hour.
sentences.chinese: 這種蛋形無人機的最高時速可達160公里。

sentences.english: A design of a low cost atmosphere data computer of the UAV based on C51 microcontroller is presented.
sentences.chinese: 大氣數據參數的採集和處理是無人機的關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: A mini UAV for reconnaissance and surveillance.
sentences.chinese: 一個用於偵察和監視小型無人機。

sentences.english: High altitude long-endurance UAV is one important branch of it.
sentences.chinese: 高空長航時無人機是其一個重要分支。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
